name: Sofabaton
0:
”Alexa, turn on the TV.”
”Alexa, turn off the TV.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Connect Alexa to your Sofabaton devices by following these steps:

Download the Sofabaton Android or iOS app.
Sign-in into the app.
Provision the device by following the on-screen instructions.
Give some user friendly name to your device. This same name will show up in Alexa.
In the Alexa app, search for the “Sofabaton” skill.
Click on “Enable skill” and sign-in using the same credentials you used in the Sofabaton app.
Once the linking is successful, allow Alexa to discover your devices.
Once the devices are successfully discovered, the setup is complete and you can start controlling them using Alexa.
Following controls are supported

Switch Controls:
“Alexa, turn on the TV.”
“Alexa, turn off the TV.”

In case you have any queries, please send an email to Service@sofabaton.com
